Package.title: Package
Package.description:
The only fields required by Whisk are [`name`]() and
[`lang`]().

name.description:
The package name is an identifier used to refer to the package.
It is also the default name of the output binary.

lang.description:
The package language can either be `c` or `c++`. It is used
to determine how to build the package and which files to expect. (default `c++`)

type.description:
The package type determines how the code is packaged.
It can either be `exe` for an executable or `lib` for a library. (default `exe`)

enumValues: Build this package as an executable.
Build this package as a library.
